Title: Camp Notice
Text:
[Latest Announcement]
Date: AL157
Contents: Due to the recent frequent occurrence of TD Outbreak, abnormal sub concentration in Wuthering Waves and other special circumstances, the Sentinel Sculpture and Canal Excavation Project will be halted with immediate effect, and all Ministry of Development and Midnight Rangers staff will be withdrawn immediately, with the restarting time of the project to be determined.

[ Expired Announcement]
Date: AL154
Contents: The road into the Gorges of Spirits was officially opened today, and Midnight Rangers special teams encountered a large accumulation of TDTD Outbreaks in the valley. The TD Outbreak was extremely dangerous, and the number of deaths, serious injuries, and missing persons is too high to be fully accounted for yet. The commander-in-chief died heroically in combat, and Jiyan has been temporarily appointed as the interim commander-in-chief.

[ Expired Announcement]
Date: AL140
Contents: Commissioned by Ministry of Development, the Midnight Rangers special squad will be in charge of the survey and cleanup of the Gorges of Spirits plot from today, so that Ministry of Development can enter the valley to carry out surveys at a later stage. It is initially expected that access to Gorges of Spirits will be opened by 150.
